translation.en: ♪ One, two, three below! ♪
-Hi. -[mic feedback]
[inhales] Hi.
My name is Aja Tarron of House Tarron,
and I want to tell you a story. It's a good story.
It is very lively, with lots of humors and excitement.
translation.ko: 대박 활기 넘치고 재미와 흥분이 가득한 얘기랍니다

translation.en: It begins someplace very, very, very far from here,
on an entirely different planet called Akiridion-5.
Twenty on the win!
-[girl] Luug, come back now! -[boy] You crushed my skill tech.
Come back here!
-[automated voice] Sector 7. -[horn honks]
You know, Luug, you are ruining a perfectly lively day.
translation.ko: 루그, 너 지금 대박 멋진 내 하루를 망치고 있어

translation.en: Smile and wave. Smile and wave.
-Where is she? It's her ceremony, too. -You know your daughter.
translation.ko: - 아자는 대체 어디 갔어요? - 당신 딸 알잖아요

translation.en: -Aja's spirited. -Your Majesties.
-Have you found our daughter? -In a manner of speaking.
translation.ko: - 우리 딸은 찾았느냐? - 그렇다고 할 수도 있습니다

translation.en: So, speak.
-It would appear she's run away. -[both] Again?
-You're late. -Sorry, Luug. Totally--
Don't "Luug" me.
If you don't get here in five mekrons, Mama and Papa will stomp you.
translation.ko: 5 메크론 안에 안 오면 엄마, 아빠한테 혼쭐날 거야

translation.en: [chuckles] I think we both know I won't be there at all.
translation.ko: 어차피 거긴 안 가, 너도 알잖아

translation.en: And we both know I don't want to be queen-in-waiting.
translation.ko: 알다시피 난 왕세녀 자리엔 관심 없어

translation.en: Ugh! You're running away again? Hey, why are you actually running?
translation.ko: 또 도망치겠다고? 지금 뛰는 이유는 뭐야?

translation.en: Luug decided to run away from me.
You're going to miss the ceremony.
Say "hi" to Mama and Papa.
Krel, my son. I have some bad news.
translation.ko: 크렐, 아들아 안 좋은 소식이 있다

translation.en: Aja ran away again and won't be attending the ceremony? [chuckles]
translation.ko: 아자가 또 도망가서 대관식에 못 올 거라는 거요?

translation.en: -I might have spoken to her. -I'm sorry, my boy.
It's fine. She's a free spirit.
One day, you will be king, your mother and I will be gone,
translation.ko: 언젠가 네가 왕이 되고 네 엄마와 내가 죽으면

translation.en: and you and Aja will be all the other has.
-What if I'm not ready to be a king? -Of course you're not ready to be king.
translation.ko: - 왕이 될 준비가 안 됐으면요? - 당연히 준비가 안 됐겠지

translation.en: No one is ever ready.
What I mean is, what if I'm not good enough?
If I know anything, my son, it is that life is a series of choices.
translation.ko: 내가 이거 하나는 안다 인생은 선택의 연속이야

translation.en: It's what we choose in the small moments that makes our lives better or worse.
translation.ko: 사소한 순간의 선택으로 삶이 더 나아지거나 나빠지기도 해

translation.en: You will not face these choices alone because you will always have your family.
translation.ko: 선택을 혼자 할 필요는 없다 네 옆엔 늘 가족이 함께할 테니까

translation.en: Including your sister, no matter how much she wishes to deny that she's a royal.
translation.ko: 왕족인 걸 부인하고 싶어 하는 네 누나 아자도 마찬가지야

translation.en: I did it!
-Impressive. -[woman] My liege.
We must begin the ceremony.
We are ready, Lieutenant Zadra.
Speak for yourself. [sighs]
Come along, Krel, King-in-waiting.
Fine. I'm ready!
-[cheering] -I guess.
I see you, you little slime-bucket!
Get back here, or I'll have you turned into flexel!
translation.ko: 당장 안 돌아오면 땔감으로 만들어 버린다!

translation.en: Sorry!
-[woman] Oh, my! -Luug, that is not a toy!
-[sneezes] -Luug! [groans]
Maybe even flexel is too good for you. [grunts]
[Coranda] For hundreds of keltons, Akiridion-5 stood divided between two houses.
translation.ko: 아키리디온 5 왕국은 수백 켈톤 동안 둘로 분열됐습니다

translation.en: The House Akraohm of my ancestors, and House Ventis of my husband's.
translation.ko: 내 조상인 아크람 가문과 남편의 조상인 벤티스 가문으로요

translation.en: Today, we celebrate the joining of these two great houses into House Tarron,
translation.ko: 오늘 우리는 이 두 가문을 태론 가문으로 통합하여

translation.en: and declare the heir to the throne to be ready and good.
[Fialkov] This ridge is the mark of our ancestors,
translation.ko: 이 산등성이 문양은 우리의 조상을 뜻하며

translation.en: and proclaims you worthy of the crown of Akiridion
translation.ko: 아키리디온 왕좌를 계승할 정당성을 상징하는 표식으로

translation.en: that has stood for righteousness since ages past.
-[Coranda] It is done. -[cheering]
[Fialkov] The King-in-waiting
will now honor the tradition of a demonstration of combat.
translation.ko: 전통에 따라 전투 시범을 보이게 됩니다

translation.en: [Coranda] Commander Varvatos Vex, step forward.
Varvatos Vex is prepared to crush.
translation.ko: 바바토스 벡스 상대를 무찌를 준비 됐습니다

translation.en: -Relax. You'll be fine. -And if I don't?
translation.ko: - 괜찮을 테니 걱정 말아라 - 안 괜찮으면요?

translation.en: You'll smile and wave. Like so.
Just go easy on me, would you?
Varvatos will give you the honor of a glorious death.
Vex, always with the death.
You do understand this whole thing is just for show, right?
Varvatos will show you glorious death!
Begin!
Varvatos will make this a memorable pummeling.
What? What, what, what?
Yes!
Oh, yes!
-[gasps] Oh, no. [chuckles] -[grunts]
You always leave your sword-hand side exposed!
You struck Varvatos! Glorious!
Varvatos will reward you with the most remarkable slaying!
Vex! Would you permit me the honor of sparring with my son, old friend?
translation.ko: 벡스, 내게 아들과 싸울 기회를 주겠나?

translation.en: -Your serrator, Varvatos. -My liege.
I sparred with my father at my coronation, as he sparred with his father before him.
translation.ko: 대관식 때 아버지와 대결하는 건 대대로 내려온 전통이다

translation.en: This is a sacred honor, Krel.
What a family.
One day, you'll be able to best me in a duel.
translation.ko: 언젠가 네가 결투에서 나를 이기는 날이 올 거다

translation.en: -You might as well begin trying. -[lasers zapping]
Those are General Morando's Strykers.
Seklos and Gaylen, what's happening?
Seek refuge! Get to the shelter, now!
My lieges, we must return you to the palace at once.
We need to find Aja!
If the city's defenses do not hold,
we cannot guarantee your safety, my royals.
How did he disable the shield?
-There is a traitor in our midst. -[Krel] Mama! Papa!
-I'm not leaving you. -You're not leaving us!
translation.ko: - 두 분을 버릴 순 없어요 - 버리는 게 아니다

translation.en: You're following orders.
Now get Vex and Zadra, and go find your sister.
She needs you now.
Oh, Luug, we've got to hurry!
-Ah! Mama! Mama! Where are you? -Look out!
Are you okay?
Davaros!
[sighs] Thank you, thank you.
No thanking. Just running!
Glorious death!
Get on!
Luug!
Don't even think about it, you filthy animal.
-What is happening? -It's a coup.
General Morando is trying to usurp the throne.
-Krel, are Mama and Papa-- -Ah!
-We've been hit! We lost firepower! -Cover me!
What? Why? Oh! Because you're trying to kill yourself.
translation.ko: 대체 왜요? 죽고 싶어서 그러는 거예요?

translation.en: Okay, not so bad.
-Oh, no, no. It's bad. -Just fix it!
Vex, a little help here?
Does Varvatos look busy right now?
translation.ko: 내가 지금 놀고 있는 것 같아?

translation.en: Krel! Status!
We have to reroute power from the secondary sub-manifold
translation.ko: 2차 서브 매니폴드에서 앰풀 어레이로 전력을 끌어와야 해요

translation.en: to the ampule array.
-Target locked. -Krel!
Almost, almost, almost! Got it! Locked and loaded.
translation.ko: 거의 다 됐어요! 됐다, 장전 완료

translation.en: Gotcha!
Glorious death to everyone!
Loyal soldiers, Val Morando is a traitor to Akiridion-5.
translation.ko: 병사들이여, 발 모란도는 아키리디온 5 왕국의 배반자다

translation.en: Your standing with him today is an act of high treason.
translation.ko: 그와 손잡는 것은 모두 반역 행위로 간주한다

translation.en: Is it?
From their perspective, it is treason not to stand with me. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 그들은 나와 손잡지 않는 걸 반역으로 여길 텐데?

translation.en: I've returned from exile to claim back what is rightfully mine!
translation.ko: 추방당했던 내가 자리를 되찾기 위해 돌아왔다!

translation.en: The time for empty talk is over!
Now arrives the horvath of action!
Stand fast.
Surrender and I will spare your lives.
-We can't trust him. -I wasn't planning to.
translation.ko: - 놈을 믿어선 안 돼요 - 그럴 생각 없었어요

translation.en: [together] For Akiridion!
For Akiridion!
-Are you scared? -I am now the king-in-waiting.
I am terrified.
[Coranda] Retreat!
Mama! Papa!
Mama, I'm sorry I ran away again.
There is no time for apologies.
You're safe. That's all that matters.
-Mama! -The Taylon have betrayed us.
We are forced to retreat. Don't worry!
As long as we're together, as long as we remain a family,
all will be well.
And you'll always have us and each other.
My lieges, without the protection of the Taylon,
there is nowhere on Akiridion we can guarantee your safety.
Lieutenant Zadra is correct. The planet is unsafe.
translation.ko: 자드라 대위 말이 맞습니다 이곳은 이제 안전하지 않아요

translation.en: We must leave here at once. Please.
[Morando] You cannot win, royals.
Surrender to me!
Get to the mother ship!
Fialkov!
Fire!
-[Fialkov grunts] -[Vex] No!
No, Morando! No!
Please, General! No!
-[Krel] No! -No!
Papa! Mama!
-My king! My queen! -[Fialkov] Varvatos...
Will you stand by my side one last time, my friend?
translation.ko: 마지막으로 내 곁을 지켜주겠나? 나의 친구여

translation.en: I will, my king.
Protect my children with your life, if necessary.
No! No!
No!
-Vex, lower the shield. -[shrieks]
-[Morando] He's taken the royal cores! -We should hurry!
I'll hold them back.
[Aja] Zadra, hurry!
Vex! You fool!
Take them to the mother ship. Keep safe! No!
translation.ko: - 두 분을 데려가서 지켜주세요 - 안 돼!

translation.en: Zadra!
Varvatos mourns, too. But grief must wait for survival!
translation.ko: 슬픈 상황인 건 알지만 지금은 살아남는 게 먼저예요

translation.en: [automated voice] Engines starting.
V-Stryker squadron, engage the mother ship! Destroy them all!
translation.ko: 브이 스트라이커 대대 모선을 공격하라 전부 없애버려!

translation.en: [automated voice] We have achieved maximum velocity.
-[Aja] Wait here. -[Krel] I had every intention.
-I'll be back. -[Vex] Unless we explode!
translation.ko: - 금방 올게 - 그 전에 폭발할지 몰라요

translation.en: -Yes, yes, unless we explode. -Hang on, King-in-waiting!
translation.ko: - 네, 폭발하지 않는다면요 - 꽉 잡아요, 왕세자님!

translation.en: Indicate operation.
Mother, save Mama and Papa. Take their cores.
translation.ko: 마더, 엄마와 아빠를 구해줘 두 분의 코어야

translation.en: -Here. -Initiating reintegration stasis.
Rewriting the King and Queen's molecular code.
translation.ko: 왕과 여왕의 분자 코드 재기록 중

translation.en: Fix them, mother ship. Please fix them!
Time to completion, unknown.
[Coranda] Aja?
-Aja! -[gasps]
Royals don't need to skulk under the cover of darkness.
translation.ko: 왕족은 얼굴을 가리고 숨어다니지 않아도 돼

translation.en: They do when they don't want to be caught staying up past curfew.
translation.ko: 통금 시간 지난 뒤에도 안 들키려면 어쩔 수 없죠

translation.en: I can't be what you want me to be. I can't be a royal.
translation.ko: 난 엄마가 원하는 것 같은 왕족이 될 수 없어요

translation.en: No one gets to choose their station in life, Aja.
translation.ko: 자신의 지위를 택할 수 있는 사람은 없어, 아자

translation.en: Maybe I'll be the first.
There are those who would trade their life cores for royalty.
translation.ko: 왕족이 되고 싶어 삶의 코어를 내놓는 사람도 있단다

translation.en: And I would trade my royalty for a life.
translation.ko: 전 왕족 신분을 내놓고 삶을 얻고 싶어요

translation.en: -A normal life. -You're remarkable, Aja.
translation.ko: - 평범한 삶 말이에요 - 넌 훌륭한 아이야

translation.en: [sighs] You say that because you're my mother.
Royal or not, you are extraordinary, Aja.
translation.ko: 왕족이든 아니든 넌 정말 뛰어난 아이란다

translation.en: That is what you are constantly running away from.
translation.ko: 넌 계속 그 사실에서 벗어나려 하는 거야

translation.en: You could leave this palace, fly far away from our world...
translation.ko: 이 궁에서 벗어나 머나먼 세계로 날아갈 수도 있겠지

translation.en: and your destiny would follow you.
translation.ko: 그래도 네 운명은 널 따라다닐 거야

translation.en: Aja, it's going to be all right.
I'm not entirely sure how, but...
They're gone.
Our parents. [sobs]
And it's all my fault.
-Don't be ridiculous. -I ran away.
If I had been on time at the ceremony,
it would have started sooner, which means it would have ended sooner,
translation.ko: 식은 더 빨리 시작해서 더 빨리 끝났을 거고

translation.en: which means Mama and Papa would have been safe in the palace.
translation.ko: 엄마, 아빠는 안전하게 궁에 가 계셨을 거야

translation.en: Hey!
And it would have ended sooner if I had done better in the duel.
translation.ko: 내가 결투만 잘했어도 대관식이 빨리 끝났겠지

translation.en: If anything, we're both to blame.
translation.ko: 굳이 따지자면 우리 둘 다 잘못했어

translation.en: I miss them already.
So do I.
You look as if you need a hug.
I'll get Varvatos.
Varvatos? [chuckles]
Varvatos, little brother, he never hugs.
That's true.
[imitates Vex] I am Varvatos. Varvatos destroys!
[Mother] The V-Strykers are not equipped for space travel. We are clear.
translation.ko: 브이 스트라이커는 우주여행이 불가하므로, 이제 안전합니다

translation.en: Mother, that won't last long.
We need to head somewhere they won't think to look for us.
translation.ko: 우릴 찾지 못할 곳으로 가야 해

translation.en: The worse the planet, the better for us.
I can only locate two planets which fit your description.
translation.ko: 묘사한 내용과 일치하는 행성은 두 군데뿐입니다

translation.en: One is about to be devoured by a black hole.
Mm. Maybe not that one.
The other is a floating ball of mud and water.
translation.ko: 다른 곳은 진흙과 물로 이루어진 떠다니는 공입니다

translation.en: Its inhabitants named it after dirt.
-They call it "Earth." -"Earth!"
translation.ko: 거주자들은 흙을 뜻하는 이름인 '지구'라고 부릅니다 지구!

translation.en: It sounds beautiful.
This is going to be quite the adventure.
I wonder what we will find there!
Ouch!
[laughs] We didn't explode!
[chuckles] Of course not. Varvatos was at the helm.
translation.ko: 바바토스가 키를 잡았으니 폭발할 리 없죠

translation.en: And yet, we're still alive.
-We did it! -[Mother] Systems damaged.
[Vex] Engage protective force shield.
Force shield inoperable.
Reroute all power to the camouflage matrix.
translation.ko: 모든 동력을 이용해 위장 매트릭스 가동해

translation.en: Complying.
I have chosen a model based on the planet's primitive transmissions.
translation.ko: 이 행성의 원시적 송신 시스템을 기초로 한 모델을 선택했습니다

translation.en: They broadcast at sub-light speed, so they're bound to be rather old.
translation.ko: 아광속을 사용하는 것으로 보아 구식인 듯합니다

translation.en: Wow. They really put this one up fast.
[Mother] One of the indigenous life forms is approaching. It may be hostile.
translation.ko: 토착 생명체가 접근합니다 적대적일 수 있습니다

translation.en: He wears massive shields over his eyes.
translation.ko: 눈에 거대한 방패를 쓴 것으로 보아

translation.en: He must be a dreaded warrior.
Varvatos will slay him!
You cannot kill everyone. We are in hiding.
translation.ko: 아무나 막 죽이면 안 되죠 지금 우린 숨어 있잖아요

translation.en: But for Varvatos, death is a way of life.
-[doorbell rings] -[boy] Hello?
-What is that awful noise? -Make it stop!
Anyone home?
Can I interest you in a subscription to the Arcadia Oaks Ledger?
translation.ko: 혹시 아카디아 오크 레저 구독 안 하실래요?

translation.en: [Vex] The cylindrical object in his hand...
-[boy] Hello? -...is it a weapon? [chuckles]
[Mother] The life form seems quite persistent.
-We cannot let it see us. -What does that mean?
translation.ko: - 놈의 눈에 띄어선 안 돼요 - 무슨 뜻이에요?

translation.en: We are trapped in here forever?
-Of course not! -[boy] Hello?
Eventually, we'll be found by Morando's forces
and massacred ever so slowly.
He's right.
We have to at least buy time for the ship to repair Mama and Papa.
translation.ko: 모선이 부모님을 고칠 수 있게 시간이라도 벌어야 해

translation.en: Mother ship, what is the state of the transduction chambers?
[Mother] Nominal. What is your question?
You can reconfigure our energies into a form
translation.ko: 우리 에너지를 이 행성 생명체의 형태로

translation.en: -that resembles this planet's life forms. -They call themselves "humans."
Mother, you have to design forms for us that no one will ever pay attention to.
translation.ko: 마더, 누구의 시선도 끌지 않을 형체로 만들어줘

translation.en: You need to make us invisible!
I have chosen three forms that people on the mud planet tend to ignore.
translation.ko: 지구인들에게 존재감 없는 세 가지 형태를 골라봤습니다

translation.en: The first of such invisible forms is a girl.
translation.ko: 첫 번째 눈에 안 띄는 형태는 여자아이입니다

translation.en: Girls here are invisible?
The next is called a Latino.
I don't understand. What is "La-tino"?
That sounds fantastic. It sounds rather regal.
translation.ko: 되게 멋지게 들려 왕의 위엄도 느껴지고

translation.en: You, Commander Vex, will be reconfigured as... a senior citizen.
translation.ko: 벡스 지휘관은 나이 많은 사람의 형태로 바뀔 겁니다

translation.en: Glorious! Varvatos should be senior to all.
translation.ko: 좋았어! 바바토스는 어른이 되는 게 어울리지!

translation.en: All three forms sound like winners!
translation.ko: 세 가지 다 멋진 거 같은데

translation.en: All right, maybe you're not home.
I'll just leave a complimentary copy here.
-Prepare to be destroyed, who-man! -[screams]
[Aja] So, you see, things did not go exactly according to plan for us.
translation.ko: 상황은 우리가 계획한 대로 흘러가지 않았어요

translation.en: But they weren't going according to plan for General Morando, either.
translation.ko: 하지만 모란도 대장의 뜻대로 흘러가지도 않았죠

translation.en: Say that again.
We couldn't track the mother ship.
It must've been some kind of cloaking device.
That's what I thought you said.
There's no place in the galaxy the royals can hide that is beyond my reach.
translation.ko: 이 은하계에서 내 손이 닿지 않는 곳은 없다

translation.en: Assemble the bounty hunters. No one can survive them.
translation.ko: 현상금 사냥꾼들을 모아라 그들 눈은 못 피할 테니
